newsitem.title: USA: Fonar says in pact with Asian supplier.
newsitem.headline: Fonar says in pact with Asian supplier.

text.p: Fonar Corp said Monday it has signed an agreement with an Asian supplier for the potential purchase of 45 Fonar Quad magnetic resonance imaging scanners.
The company said it is a two phase agreement with Phase I to involve five scanner sales within two years.
The successful completion of Phase I will trigger Phase II, in which a portion of the assembly of the MRI scanners, as well as the marketing of the scanners, may be conducted in Asia.
A pre-condition for entering into Phase II will be orders for 40 Quad MRI systems backed by a letter of credit for a minimum of $29 million, it said.
It did not name the Asian supplier. Fonar also did not disclose the total value of the deal.
